title: Middlekauff – 3 & Out – NFL "Max" QB's; Brady the G.O.A.T. teammate; Lamar Jackson has problems
itunes:title: Middlekauff – 3 & Out – NFL "Max" QB's; Brady the G.O.A.T. teammate; Lamar Jackson has problems
description:
Subscribe here to the 3 and Out with John Middlekauff Podcast https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/3-and-out-with-john-middlekauff/id1352730623?mt=2.

In this episode, Middlekauff looks at which quarterbacks would be considered "max" players  by NBA standards, how paying the right or wrong QB can affect a team, why Tom Brady is still proving he's an elite teammate by connecting with younger players, and why Lamar Jackson's throwing issues are going to be big problem in Baltimore. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to www.theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
